name: Password cracker 02
description:
The malicious party have managed to encrypt some of the files on the signon-o-tron team servers.

To taunt us they have hidden the password for the encrypted files inside another binary.

The say that the file can not be reverse engineered and that we have to guess the password.

Brute forcing this password could take days, so you need to find a way of getting the message out of: Linux, Windows .
hint: Try watching the binary run in a Hex Editor and check what it compares your input against.
